name: Tooltip - 100% Auto Layout Component
description:
This file illustrates two methods of implementation of a tooltip design:

- Auto layout with manual width resizing.

- Constraints requiring manual resizing.


The tooltip design called for:

  • 12 beak positions.
  • 4 variants (style=solid/bordered, beak location, dismissable=true/false, title=true/false).
